testcase.name: Get all albums
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Get all albums # src/test/java/features/albums.feature:6 Given the API base URL is "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com" # stepDefinitions.PostsSteps.the_api_base_url_is(java.lang.String) When I send a GET request to "/albums" # stepDefinitions.PostsSteps.i_send_a_get_request_to(java.lang.String) Then the response status code should be 200 # stepDefinitions.PostsSteps.the_response_status_code_should_be(java.lang.Integer) And the response should contain 100 items # stepDefinitions.PostsSteps.the_response_should_contain_items(java.lang.Integer)

testcase.name: Get album by valid ID
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Get album by valid ID # src/test/java/features/albums.feature:11 Given the API base URL is "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com" # stepDefinitions.PostsSteps.the_api_base_url_is(java.lang.String) When I send a GET request to "/albums/1" # stepDefinitions.PostsSteps.i_send_a_get_request_to(java.lang.String) Then the response status code should be 200 # stepDefinitions.PostsSteps.the_response_status_code_should_be(java.lang.Integer) And the field "id" should equal 1 # stepDefinitions.PostsSteps.the_field_should_equal_int(java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer)
